result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ga: leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.orig: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.html: leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimheTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ponchtml: leag beirt ḟear go talaṁ í agus ġoid siad a mála láiṁeTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: Watch out, your bag is open!
result.ga: seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.orig: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.html: seachain tá do mhála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!
result.ponchtml: seaċain tá do ṁála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!

result.eng: Take it out of the bag.
result.ga: tóg as an mhála é
result.html: tóg as an mhála éTake it out of the bag.
result.ponchtml: tóg as an ṁála éTake it out of the bag.

result.eng: I have my whistles here in my bag.
result.ga: tá mo chuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo mhála
result.orig: Tá mo chuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo mhála
result.html: tá mo chuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo mhálaI have my whistles here in my bag.
result.ponchtml: tá mo ċuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo ṁálaI have my whistles here in my bag.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
